title: Single Sign-Up
description: SalesCandy SSU is a SalesCandy Self Sign-Up that aims for the B2C market. This application adopts the backbone of its proven predecessors which is SalesCandy Enterprise. The top-notch feature of this SalesCandy SSU is the Salesperson community effect, where each salesperson can collaborate on their sales campaign with another salesperson.
short_description: SalesCandy's Self Sign-Up that aims for the B2C market.
